headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Fireside Chat at the UBS Global Consumer and Retail Conference 2026
summary: NEW YORK, February 25, 2026--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Chief Investor Relations Officer and EVP, M&A, John Faucher, will participate in a fireside chat at the UBS Global Consumer and Retail Conference on Wednesday, March 11, 2026 at 2:00 p.m. ET.
